findings.lungs: Mild bibasilar atelectasis is symmetric. No pericardial or pleural effusion.
findings.liver: Homogenous attenuation throughout. No focal lesions or biliary dilatation. Gallbladder within normal limits.
findings.pancreas: Normal attenuation throughout. No focal lesions or pancreatic ductal dilatation. No peripancreatic stranding.
findings.spleen: Mildly enlarged, measuring up to 16 cm.
findings.kidneys: Normal and symmetric size with normal nephrogram. No focal renal lesions or hydronephrosis.
findings.gastrointestinal: Small hiatal hernia noted. Appendix dilated and fluid-filled, measuring 1.5 cm with peripheral stranding and mucosal hyperemia.
findings.pelvis: Urinary bladder unremarkable. No free fluid in the pelvis.
findings.lymph nodes: Scattered mesenteric nodes in right lower quadrant likely reactive. No pelvic or inguinal lymphadenopathy.
findings.vascular: No abdominal aortic aneurysm or atherosclerotic disease noted.
findings.bones: No evidence of worrisome osseous lesions or acute fracture.
findings.soft tissues: Abdominal and pelvic wall within normal limits.
